report-definition.name: Successful Framework Requests
report-definition.sql: select handler, request, day, month, year, sum(requests) from _escidocaggdef1_request_statistics group by handler, request, day, month, year;

report-definition.name: Successful Framework Requests by Month and Year
report-definition.sql: select * from _escidocaggdef1_request_statistics where month = {month} and year = {year};

report-definition.name: Item retrievals, all users
report-definition.sql: select object_id as itemid, sum(requests) as itemrequests from _escidocaggdef1_object_statistics where object_id = {object_id} and handler='de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieve' group by object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads per Item, all users
report-definition.sql: select parent_object_id as itemid, sum(requests) as filerequests from _escidocaggdef1_object_statistics where parent_object_id = {object_id} and handler='de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieveContent' group by parent_object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads, all users
report-definition.sql: select object_id as fileid, sum(requests) as filerequests from _escidocaggdef1_object_statistics where object_id = {object_id} and handler='de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieveContent' group by object_id;

report-definition.name: Item retrievals, anonymous users
report-definition.sql: select object_id as itemid, sum(requests) as itemrequests from _escidocaggdef1_object_statistics where object_id = {object_id} and handler='de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieve' and user_id='' group by object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads per Item, anonymous users
report-definition.sql: select parent_object_id as itemid, sum(requests) as filerequests from _escidocaggdef1_object_statistics where parent_object_id = {object_id} and handler='de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieveContent' and user_id='' group by parent_object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads, anonymous users
report-definition.sql: select object_id as fileid, sum(requests) as filerequests from _escidocaggdef1_object_statistics where object_id = {object_id} and handler='de.escidoc.core.om.service.ItemHandler' and request='retrieveContent' and user_id='' group by object_id;
